column4: helloâ€¦ i have a laptop with ubuntu on it and i basically just want it to tunnel any traffic it gets over the wireless network that its connected to through the ethernet to a computer connected to it. is there a guide for doing this?
ubuntu would automatically detect it through Auto-eth0
it would work for regular web traffic, but not for *everything*. I even want to to send all ftp traffic and ssh traffic through the ubuntu laptop through ethernet to the connected computer
